query.nsql: SELECT @SELECT:DIM:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:GL_ACCOUNTS:X.MAIN_ACCOUNT_ID:CODE@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:GL_ACCOUNTS:X.LAST_UPDATED_DATE:LAST_UPDATED_DATE@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:GL_ACCOUNTS:X.LAST_UPDATED_BY:LAST_UPDATED_BY@ FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT cga.main_account_id AS main_account_id, cga.last_updated_date AS last_updated_date, csu.user_name AS last_updated_by FROM cbk_gl_account cga LEFT JOIN cmn_sec_users csu ON csu.id = cga.last_updated_by WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT sq.main_account_id, sq.last_updated_date FROM ( SELECT main_account_id, MAX(last_updated_date) AS last_updated_date FROM cbk_gl_account GROUP BY main_account_id ) sq WHERE sq.main_account_id = cga.main_account_id AND sq.last_updated_date = cga.last_updated_date ) ) x WHERE @FILTER@
